SEARCH
Package vendingMachineSimulator

Class RegularVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
vendingMachineSimulator.RegularVendingMachine
public class RegularVendingMachine extends Object
A regular vending machine, can hold up to 8 item slots with a max capacity of 10 each. Supports denomination management through a Wallet and machine history recording.
Author:
Vance Gyan M. Robles

  • Field Summary

    • addItemStock

      public void addItemStock(int itemIndex, int addedAmount)

      Adds a given amount of items into the item slot (increments its amount value by a given value)

      Parameters:
      itemIndex - the index of the item to be restocked
      addedAmount - the amount of items to be added

    • hasEnoughDenominations

      public boolean hasEnoughDenominations(TreeMap<Double,Integer> change)

      Validates a converted change treemap to see if the machine has enough denominations to return it to the user

      Parameters:
      change - is the treemap of a given double change value
      Returns:
      true if valid (no negative values after map subtraction), false if not

    • updatePurchaseHistory

      public void updatePurchaseHistory(double insertedCash, int itemIndex, double change)

      Creates a summary of a user's transaction and adds it into the machineHistory ArrayList

      Parameters:
      insertedCash - is the amount of cash given by the user
      itemIndex - is the itemIndex of the item dispensed
      change - is the change received by the user

    • updateStockHistory

      public void updateStockHistory(int itemIndex, int addedStock, int previousStock)

      Creates a summary of a user's addition to the item stock and adds it into the machineHistory ArrayList

      Parameters:
      itemIndex - is the itemIndex of the item whose stock has been updated
      addedStock - is the amount of items added
      previousStock - is the amount of items that the machine had before the action

    • updateStockHistory

      public void updateStockHistory(double key, int addedStock, int previousStock, double previousTotal)

      Creates a summary of a user's addition to denomination stock and adds it into the machineHistory ArrayList

      Parameters:
      key - is the denomination whose stock has been updated
      addedStock - is the amount added
      previousStock - is the amount that the machine had before the action
      previousTotal - is the previous total funds in the machine before the action

    • updatePriceHistory

      public void updatePriceHistory(int itemIndex, double oldPrice)

      Creates a summary of a user's price update and adds it into the machineHistory ArrayList

      Parameters:
      itemIndex - is the itemIndex of the item whose price has been updated
      oldPrice - is the old price of the item
